title: Achievements from Episode 6 patch are missing

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Forgot to go through the whitelist yesterday.

All the achievements unlocked so far should be blessed.

comments.author: Zok.4956
comments.body:
It seems the new achievements from the Episode 6 patch are missing in the api.

Example:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements?ids=3548,3547,3542,3537,3533

The IDs are from achievements that users already have done.

please take a look.
thanks.

P.S. The highest achievement id in /v2/achievements is actually ID 3453 “Llama Roundup” created at 2017-06-20.
